title: Full-Stack Web with Nothing But Python: A Deep Dive into Anvil
description:
"Full-Stack Web with Nothing But Python: A Deep Dive into Anvil" by: Meredydd Luff

The Web stack is famously complicated, with a huge number of languages and libraries for even a simple app. What if, instead, we could do it all in Python?
I'll be taking a deep dive into Anvil, an open-source framework for building full-stack web-apps with nothing but Python. That means Python in the browser, Python on the server, Python for the database - even a Python UI toolkit! I'll be digging into how Anvil works, but *why* it's so important to bring Pythonic values to the full web stack.

Recorded at the 2020 Python Web Conference (https://2020.pythonwebconf.com)
